message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. How about we compromise at $95?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about we compromise at $92.50?
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. Would you be willing to go down to $88?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about we compromise at $91?
